meanings.definition: Fumarase: an enzyme that catalyzes the reversible hydration/dehydration of fumarate to malate.
meanings.sent1: The fumarase in our bodies helps convert fumarate to malate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fumarase to understand how it transforms fumarate into malate.
meanings.sent3: The fumarase enzyme decided to take a break from converting fumarate.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like fumarase, efficiently converting challenges into successes.
meanings.sent5: The fumarase enzyme works like a tiny, precise machine, turning fumarate into malate flawlessly.
